testsuite.name: com.allegis.tests.TestCase1
testsuite.system-out: email added successfully password added successfully Logged into the account successfully
Add HP laptop 3065 to the shopping cart Logged into the account successfully The laptop HP3065 added successfully to the cart

Add palm treo pro phone to wish list Logged into the account successfully view changed from grid to list cost changed to low-high Palm Treo pro is added successfully to the wishlist and success message is displayed

Add Apple cinema 30 and samsung monitor to the comparelist Logged into the account successfully The currency changed to pounds Apple cinema 30 added successfully to the compare list samsung monitor added successfully to the compare list Apple cinema 30 monitor and samsung monitor compared successfully
Order a new Samsung SyncMaster 941BW confirm the order and verify the confirm text Logged into the account successfully Your order of Samsung SyncMaster 941BW is confirmed and the text is verified
